    return self._call_impl(*args, **kwargs)

    return F.linear(input, self.weight, self.bias)

      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.089)
                )
                (26): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.091)
                )
              )
            )
            (3): ConvNeXtStage(
              (downsample): Sequential(
                (0): LayerNorm2d((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                (1): Conv2d(768, 1536, kernel_size=(2, 2), stride=(2, 2))
              )
              (blocks): Sequential(
                (0): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.094)
                )
                (1): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.097)
                )
                (2): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

                )

                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)

                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()

            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )

                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)

                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

      )

            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.097)
                )
                (2): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

              (downsample): Sequential(
                (0): LayerNorm2d((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                (1): Conv2d(768, 1536, kernel_size=(2, 2), stride=(2, 2))
              )
              (blocks): Sequential(
                (0): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.094)
                )
                (1): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.097)
                )
                (2): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.089)
                )
                (26): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.091)
                )
              )
            )
            (3): ConvNeXtStage(
              (downsample): Sequential(
                (0): LayerNorm2d((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                (1): Conv2d(768, 1536, kernel_size=(2, 2), stride=(2, 2))
              )
              (blocks): Sequential(
                (0): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.094)
                )
                (1): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.097)
                )
                (2): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.083)
                )
                (24): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.086)
                )
                (25): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.089)
                )
                (26): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.091)
                )
              )
            )
            (3): ConvNeXtStage(
              (downsample): Sequential(
                (0): LayerNorm2d((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                (1): Conv2d(768, 1536, kernel_size=(2, 2), stride=(2, 2))
              )
              (blocks): Sequential(
                (0): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.094)
                )
                (1): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.097)
                )
                (2): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.080)
                )
                (23): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.083)
                )
                (24): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.086)
                )
                (25): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.089)
                )
                (26): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.091)
                )
              )
            )
            (3): ConvNeXtStage(
              (downsample): Sequential(
                (0): LayerNorm2d((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                (1): Conv2d(768, 1536, kernel_size=(2, 2), stride=(2, 2))
              )
              (blocks): Sequential(
                (0): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.094)
                )
                (1): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.097)
                )
                (2): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.074)
                )
                (21): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.077)
                )
                (22): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)

                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.080)
                )
                (23): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)

                (24): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)

                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)

                )
                (25): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)

                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.089)
                )
                (26): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(768, 768, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=768)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()

                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.091)
                )
              )
            )
            (3): ConvNeXtStage(
              (downsample): Sequential(
                (0): LayerNorm2d((768,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                (1): Conv2d(768, 1536, kernel_size=(2, 2), stride=(2, 2))
              )
              (blocks): Sequential(
                (0): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.094)
                )
                (1): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.097)
                )
                (2): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)
                    (act): GELU()
                    (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                    (norm): Identity()
                    (fc2): Linear(in_features=6144, out_features=1536, bias=True)
                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

                )

                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)

                  (shortcut): Identity()

                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()

            (mlp): Sequential(

              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )

    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )

              )
              (blocks): Sequential(
                (0): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)

                )
                (2): ConvNeXtBlock(
                  (conv_dw): Conv2d(1536, 1536, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3), groups=1536)
                  (norm): LayerNorm((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
                  (mlp): Mlp(
                    (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=6144, bias=True)

                    (drop2): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
                  )
                  (shortcut): Identity()
                  (drop_path): DropPath(drop_prob=0.100)
                )
              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(
            (global_pool): SelectAdaptivePool2d(pool_type=avg, flatten=Identity())
            (norm): LayerNorm2d((1536,), eps=1e-06, elementwise_affine=True)
            (flatten): Flatten(start_dim=1, end_dim=-1)
            (pre_logits): Identity()
            (drop): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (fc): Identity()
          )
        )
        (head): Sequential(
          (mlp): Mlp(
            (fc1): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=1536, bias=True)
            (act): GELU(approximate='none')
            (drop1): Dropout(p=0.0, inplace=False)
            (norm): Identity()
            (fc2): Linear(in_features=1536, out_features=768, bias=False)
            (drop2): Dropout(p=0, inplace=False)
          )
        )
      )
      (transformer): Transformer(
        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)

    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

              )
            )
          )
          (norm_pre): Identity()
          (head): NormMlpClassifierHead(

          )

      )

  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine

    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(

    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)

        (resblocks): ModuleList(
          (0-15): 16 x ResidualAttentionBlock(
            (ln_1): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (attn): MultiheadAttention(
              (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_1): Identity()
            (ln_2): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
            (mlp): Sequential(
              (c_fc): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=3072, bias=True)
              (gelu): GELU(approximate='none')
              (c_proj): Linear(in_features=3072, out_features=768, bias=True)
            )
            (ls_2): Identity()
          )
        )
      )
      (token_embedding): Embedding(49408, 768)
      (ln_final): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
    )
  )
  (mask_pooling): MaskPooling()
  (void_embedding): Embedding(1, 768)
  (cdt): ContentDependentTransfer(
    (pe_layer): Positional encoding PositionEmbeddingSine
        num_pos_feats: 384
        temperature: 10000
        normalize: True
        scale: 6.283185307179586
    (cross_atten): ShortCut_CrossAttention(
      (multihead_attn): MultiheadAttention(
        (out_proj): NonDynamicallyQuantizableLinear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
      )
      (norm): LayerNorm((768,), eps=1e-05, elementwise_affine=True)
      (MLP): Linear(in_features=768, out_features=768, bias=True)
    )
  )
  (ma_loss): MA_Loss(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
  (rc_loss): Representation_Compensation(
    (sl1): SmoothL1Loss()
  )
)
